Brothel Law
These laws determine the legal status of prostitution.
Legal Prostitution
Prostitution is legal and brothels are allowed to operate as long as they please.
Prostitution Outlawed
Prostitution is illegal and all brothels put out of business. Anyone found operating a brothel will be heavily fined and potentially put to death
Brothels bring in money!
Lust is a sin!
Only weak men lie with whores.
